xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 13 February 2014
xwikidoc.content: <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 13:55 <mcupak> has quit 14:03 <akats> I'm not sure if this will solve the problem or if it's the right place to write the code in. Could you check? This is just a part of the code. https://github.com/soLEED/phenotips-1/compare/issue-723?expand=1 14:03 <akats> Thank you 14:06 <sdumitriu> akats: getFormData is called many times... Fixing the IDs at every call is expensive 14:18 <sdumitriu> allasm: http://phenotips.org/DevGuide/UIX 14:25 <sdumitriu> allasm: http://localhost:8080/bin/edit/PhenoTips/PatientAccessRightsManagement?editor=object 15:34 <akats> sdumitriu: DocumentSaveEvent - is that deprecated? 15:35 <sdumitriu> Yes 15:36 <sdumitriu> There are two: DocumentUpdatingEvent and DocumentUpdatedEvent that you can use 15:37 <sdumitriu> The first one is sent with the data that is going to be saved, and you can change it before the actual save happens 15:37 <sdumitriu> The second one is sent after the document has already been saved 15:38 <sdumitriu> But each time you listen to Updating event, you should also listen to DocumentCreatingEvent, since that one is sent the first time the document is saved 15:48 <marta__> has joined #phenotips 16:25 <akats> are fields within a DBStringListProperty mutable? 16:26 <akats> Actually nevermind 16:34 <akats> I get a patientClass object from a xwikidoc as a BaseObject. Then 16:35 <akats> I get a field which is clearly shown as a DBStringListProperty. However, per documentation it should be a PropertyInterface and therefore I cast it. Does the list stay mutable? 16:36 <akats> As in if I change it, would it reflect in the original xwikidoc? 17:00 <akats> Before I forget, is monday off for us or can I still come? 17:00 <sdumitriu> Officially it's off 17:01 <sdumitriu> Unofficially we're going to be working, but I'm not sure if from home or from here 17:01 <akats> Aha, I see 17:01 <sdumitriu> The building might be closed... Security has a day off too 17:22 <akats> Would it be possible to do some work from home? 17:24 <sdumitriu> Sure 17:25 <akats> Sweet. Should I start on issue-708 (https://github.com/phenotips/phenotips/issues/708?source=cc) while you check this issue and the work on membership applications? 17:26 <sdumitriu> I think marta__ has another issue for you 17:26 <akats> Ok 17:38 <akats> has quit 17:48 <sdumitriu> allasm: https://gsoc.ccm.sickkids.ca/GoogleSummerOfCode/Mobile+UI+for+the+Pedigree+tool2014
